labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

pulls.title: fix: linting and docname
pulls.author: crankynetman
pulls.body:
This fixes the Markdown file so that everything runs happily in CI. 

You'll probably want to run `make` in your local environment and then `make fix-lint` before pushing, as that makes sure that everything is cleaned up and happy for the build process.

pulls.title: buraglio-suggestions
pulls.author: buraglio
pulls.body: Thanks for working on this. I made a few minor suggestions asI read it. Great work!!
